document.full_text: chad's president idriss deby won a presidential election by a landslide, according to official results released on monday, but the outcome was rejected by the opposition as illegitimate after a boycott.
document.title: chad's deby wins re-election in boycotted poll
lines_and_colors: chad's president idriss deby won a presidential election by a landslide, according to official results released on monday, but the outcome was rejected by the opposition as illegitimate after a boycott.
